value:
$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Smile|Look, Seið! That stone tower...
That's the temple of Lady Nerþuz.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You're right, Heið! ...Ah, but we must
not rush. A goddess must maintain
her dignity at all times.$k$p$EFace|Ahem... Let us proceed with caution,
children of Midgard.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ルキノ,ch11_30_Lucino_F_Normal,Face|I am Lucia—retainer to Queen
Elincia of Crimea.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Lady Seiðr, Lady Heiðr, the food
is ready for us to eat! You should
join us!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, child of Midgard.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes, you are kind to invite us to join
in your meal. We goddesses, though,
have no need to eat...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Well, the food is delicious... I'm sure
it will raise your spirits! That alone
has to be good for you!$k$pNourishment and rest are good for
anyone's recovery!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face|That is true... Seið, why don't you
join the children of Midgard and
enjoy the fine meal they've made?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|Of course... It would be rude of me
to refuse such a kind offer.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Did I mention it's delicious?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Smile|Heehee... Then I suppose I ought
to join in as well! Thank you.$k$p$Sbs150|
